name: IX Battlegroup Operative
shortDescription: Begin your career as an undercover operative of the IX Battlegroup
longDescription:
Despite your reputation as an independent spacer seeking fame and fortune, you are in fact a deep cover operative of the 9th Domain Battlegroup. You have received the very best training that Fleet Command could provide, and safe harbor awaits you in a system where few others dare to tread.

Should you ever take a commission with any other faction, Fleet patrols will treat you as a hostile intruder to maintain appearances.
